data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for M´gladbach close to the penalty box.
In the minute 1, Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
Christoph Kramer (M´gladbach) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Cortus.
In the minute 4, M´gladbach's Matthias Ginter gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Benjamin Cortus awards Frankfurt a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 5, Frankfurt have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in their own half.
Benjamin Cortus awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 6, Goal kick for M´gladbach at Commerzbank Arena.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
The match at Commerzbank Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Kevin Trapp, who is down injured.
In the minute 10, Kevin Trapp is back on his feet again.
Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Frankfurt.
M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 12, Alassane Plea for the away team is judged to be offside.
Frankfurt awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick M´gladbach.
In the minute 13, Makoto Hasebe is booked for the home team.
Goal! Lars Stindl gives M´gladbach a 0-1 lead.
Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
In the minute 16, Frankfurt's Aymen Barkok misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Frankfurt.
Benjamin Cortus signals a Frankfurt throw-in in M´gladbach's half.
In the minute 17, In Frankfurt a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
In the minute 21, An attacking Frankfurt player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Stefan Lainer (M´gladbach) gets a yellow card.
Andre Silva scores from the spot to level the match at 1-1.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for M´gladbach at Commerzbank Arena.
Frankfurt awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andre Silva is on target to give Frankfurt a 2-1 advantage.
In the minute 24, Aymen Barkok instrumental with a fine assist.
M´gladbach are whistled for offside.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Cortus.
In the minute 28, Oscar Wendt of M´gladbach gets in a strike, but is off target.
Frankfurt have a goal kick.
Throw-in Frankfurt.
In the minute 29, In Frankfurt a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Frankfurt is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to M´gladbach just outside Frankfurt's area.
In the minute 30, David Abraham (Frankfurt) has received a yellow card from Benjamin Cortus.
Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
Ball safe as Frankfurt is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 32, Free kick Frankfurt.
Goal! Frankfurt extend their lead to 3-1 through Aymen Barkok.
That's a fine assist from Andre Silva.
In the minute 34, Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
Marcus Thuram (M´gladbach) strikes at Commerzbank Arena but his header is cleared.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Frankfurt to check on Martin Hinteregger, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
Benjamin Cortus awards the home team a throw-in.
Martin Hinteregger is back on the pitch.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Frankfurt in the half of M´gladbach.
At Commerzbank Arena, Frankfurt are penalized for being offside.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
In the minute 40, Can Frankfurt get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in M´gladbach's half?
Filip Kostic for Frankfurt drives towards goal at Commerzbank Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for M´gladbach at Commerzbank Arena.
Ball goes out of play for a Frankfurt goal kick.
Frankfurt to take a throw-in in M´gladbach territory.
In the minute 45, Frankfurt are coming forward and Erik Durm gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Frankfurt.
In the minute 45, Benjamin Cortus will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for M´gladbach in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway at Commerzbank Arena.
Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 46, Free kick M´gladbach.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Hannes Wolf with Valentino Lazaro.
Denis Zakaria is replacing Laszlo Benes for the away team.
Can Frankfurt get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in M´gladbach's half?
Frankfurt awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Benjamin Cortus waits before resuming play because David Abraham for Frankfurt is still down.
David Abraham returns to the field for Frankfurt after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in for Frankfurt in their own half.
In the minute 51, Benjamin Cortus blows against M´gladbach's Alassane Plea for offside.
M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Frankfurt.
In the minute 55, Benjamin Cortus signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Frankfurt's half.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Cortus.
Frankfurt's Amin Younes is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Frankfurt.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Frankfurt in the half of M´gladbach.
Throw-in high up the field for Frankfurt in Frankfurt.
Throw-in for M´gladbach at Commerzbank Arena.
In the minute 60, Frankfurt to take a throw-in in M´gladbach territory.
Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Frankfurt's half?
Benjamin Cortus awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 62, M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Frankfurt territory.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
M´gladbach are pushing forward but Christoph Kramer's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 63, Frankfurt have a goal kick.
Benjamin Cortus awards the home team a throw-in.
Breel Embolo is on a sub for Alassane Plea for M´gladbach.
In the minute 64, Frankfurt's Amin Younes breaks free at Commerzbank Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Benjamin Cortus awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 66, Frankfurt awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Frankfurt Frankfurt attack through David Abraham. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Frankfurt.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
M´gladbach needs to be cautious. Frankfurt have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 69, Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Frankfurt make their first substitution with Dominik Kohr replacing Amin Younes.
In the minute 73, Benjamin Cortus signals a throw-in for Frankfurt, close to M´gladbach's area.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in their own half.
In the minute 74, M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
Frankfurt's Dominik Kohr has been booked in Frankfurt.
Benjamin Cortus signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
Denis Zakaria for M´gladbach has been booked by Benjamin Cortus and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 79, Free kick in a good position for Frankfurt!
Important block from the M´gladbach defence as Aymen Barkok fires in a strike for Frankfurt.
Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
In the minute 80, In Frankfurt a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Sebastian Rode (Frankfurt) has received a first yellow card.
David Abraham (Frankfurt) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
In the minute 81, At Commerzbank Arena, Breel Embolo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Ibrahima Traore is replacing Oscar Wendt for the away team.
Goal kick for Frankfurt at Commerzbank Arena.
In the minute 83, Stefan Ilsanker is replacing Andre Silva for Frankfurt at Commerzbank Arena.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Cortus.
Benjamin Cortus awards Frankfurt a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Benjamin Cortus signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Frankfurt's half.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
In the minute 89, M´gladbach have been given a penalty...
Can M´gladbach capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Frankfurt's half?
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for M´gladbach close to the penalty box.
Aymen Barkok for Frankfurt has been booked by Benjamin Cortus and receives a first yellow card.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Frankfurt.
M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Frankfurt.
Throw-in for M´gladbach at Commerzbank Arena.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Frankfurt.
Benjamin Cortus signals a Frankfurt throw-in in M´gladbach's half.
The match has come to a close in Frankfurt. The final score is 3-3.
Lars Stindl's penalty pulls one back for M´gladbach at Commerzbank Arena.
The home team replace Sebastian Rode with Daichi Kamada.
Adi Hutter (Frankfurt) is making a fourth substitution, with Danny Da Costa replacing Aymen Barkok.
Lars Stindl (M´gladbach) nets with a header to make it 3-3 at Commerzbank Arena.
